title: Where are former WWAY\'s news people Steve Rondinaro and Greg Privett??
text:
Here's a previous link at MyReporter.com that should answer your
question about Steve Rondinaro: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6386



Greg Privett moved back to Alabama. Here's the latest from WWAY:
http://www.wwaytv3.com/wway-newschannel-3-announces-new-anchor-line-for-new-year/12/2010
